alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Harris County through 515 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greater Fifth Ward, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bellaire, West University Place, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Midtown Houston, Downtown Houston, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Second Ward, Greater Heights, Neartown / Montrose, Greater Eastwood, Near Northside Houston, Greater Fifth Ward, Memorial Park, Greater Third Ward, Fourth Ward, University Place, Spring Valley and Astrodome Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
